values: 烟雾；抽烟；香烟；雪茄烟；<俚>大城市；熏制食品；烟幕
（习惯性）吸烟；抽（烟）；吸食（烟草或毒品）；冒烟；冒气；熏制（食物；肉或鱼）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 冒烟的；烟熏味的；熏着的；呛人的；烟状的

word_group.brief_definition: 被烧毁, 被焚毁；失败, 破灭
无火不生烟；无风不起浪
这事你看着办吧；这事你考虑考虑
word_group.phrase: put that in your pipe and smoke it

bilingual.source: Smog comes from the words "smoke" and "fog".
bilingual.target: 烟雾来自“烟”和“雾”这两个词。

bilingual.source: While smoke is puffing from its head.
bilingual.target: 同时烟雾从它的头部冒出。

bilingual.source: Teenagers should not be allowed to smoke.
bilingual.target: 青少年不应该被允许吸烟。

bilingual.source: Teenagers under eighteen must not allow to smoke.
bilingual.target: 十八岁以下的青少年不得吸烟。

bilingual.source: And factories that burn coal also pollute the air with a lot of black smoke.
bilingual.target: 燃煤的工厂也会排放大量黑烟污染空气。

bilingual.source: We stared in disbelief at the black smoke rising above the burning building.
bilingual.target: 我们难以置信地盯着燃烧大楼上升的黑烟。

bilingual.source: When Mum asks you to smoke outside, you think she's just being difficult.
bilingual.target: 当妈妈让你到外面吸烟时，你认为她只是难相处。

bilingual.source: Not many people like the smell of smoke in their house or on their clothes.
bilingual.target: 很少有人喜欢家里或衣服上的烟味。

bilingual.source: Doctors have found that more and more people who don't smoke are falling ill.
bilingual.target: 医生发现越来越多不吸烟的人也生病了。

list.abstract: smoke（英 [sməʊk]，美 [smoʊk]），英语单词，作名词用，为烟；大城市；抽烟。作动词用，为冒烟；冒气；熏制。短语搭配有smoke alarm（烟雾报警器），例句为“A smoke alarm lasts about ten years.（烟雾报警器大约可以使用十年。）” smoke名词类近义词有tobacco、ephemerality，不及物动词类近义词有fume，及物动词类近义词有puff on，过去式和过去分词为smoked，现在分词为smoking，名词形式为smoking、smoker。
Smoke是游戏《彩虹六号：围攻》的一位布防手角色。

yingyinNormal.en: Smoke? I'd better not. I live just up there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抽烟吗？不用了，我就住在那儿。

yingyinNormal.en: There was the smell of smoke. Alarms sounded.
yingyinNormal.zh: 到处都是烟雾的气味，警报的声响。

yingyinNormal.en: What's going on out there? Smoke, Sir. The southeast.
yingyinNormal.zh: 外面是怎么回事？是狼烟，陛下，东南方。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't swa... Oh. I'm putting smoke in your... Sorry about that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别扇，噢，我把烟弄到你那去了，抱歉。

yingyinNormal.en: I got you a talking Thomas the Tank Engine for Thanksgiving. With real puffing smoke? Yes. All right. But I'm watching you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感恩节我送你个托马斯蒸汽火车头。会喷真的烟吗？会。好吧，但我记住你了。

yingyinNormal.en: If you are gonna smoke, only on the balconies. There are fifteen different balconies, choose one if you wanna smoke. OK, I don't smoke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你想抽烟的话，只能在阳台上抽。这儿有15个阳台，你想抽的话选一个。嗯，我不抽烟的。

yingyinNormal.en: I will be joining him there in less than a week. Do you smoke? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不到一周我也要去北京。你抽烟吗？不抽。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't secretly smoke, do you? No. So it's just your mother then.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你该不会是偷偷在抽烟吧？不。那就是你妈在抽烟。

yingyinNormal.en: Nancy doesn't smoke. Well, at least the perfume's not mine. Be thankful for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 南茜可不抽烟。那至少那香水不是我的，你这点到是不用担心。

yingyinNormal.en: She wears the costume. Gunfire in the background. A hint of smoke. Our Mockingjay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让她穿上制服，用战场作为背景，再来点烟雾，这就是我们的嘲笑鸟。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no, no, no. I smell smoke. Well, I didn't turn the oven on yet. Did you? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，不，不，是烟味。我还没开烤炉呢，你开了吗？还没。

yingyinNormal.en: And so I'll say it in Latin or Klingon or smoke signals, if that's not cultural appropriation. It is. Okay, so not smoke signals. But I want to do this right. Me, too. Let's go plan a wedding.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会用拉丁文和克林贡语说一遍或者是用狼烟信号，如果不会对原住民文化不敬的话。会的。好吧，就不用狼烟。但我想把这件事做好。我也是。那就让我们来计划一场婚礼吧。

yingyinNormal.en: For an authentic Singaporean 'Makan' experience, follow the satay smoke to the nearest hawkers center.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想要体会正宗的新加坡美食？循着炊烟到附近的熟食中心逛逛。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Well, hey. Wow, somebody smoked out here? Oh my God, don't people know you're not allowed to smoke in public spaces?
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿！哇，有人在这里抽烟吗？天啊，难道他们不晓得在公共场所是不可以抽烟的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Then I'll dust. I did that, too. Then I'll check the batteries in the smoke detectors. Howard just did that. Yeah, let him do it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我去扫灰。我也做完了。那我去检查烟雾侦测器里的电池。霍华德刚检查完。没事，让他做吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Humidity is low, it's a dry night, little bit of wind to dispel the smoke, I think they gonna be in for a tremendous treat and it could start any moment now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 湿度低，干燥的夜晚，有点吹散烟雾的微风，他们会好好利用这一情况，现在演出随时。

yingyinNormal.en: You know when the wok's hot enough, when you start to see a little bit of smoke just coming off the surface of the oil and sometimes you can see the oil glisten as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 油表面开始冒出一点白烟时，你就知道锅已经热得差不多了，有时候也会看到油开始发亮。

yingyinNormal.en: This is huge. I know. How bad do you wanna smoke right now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是很大件事。现在想不想抽一支？

yingyinNormal.en: So Frank was my roommate and Frank like nothing more than to smoke weed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗兰克是我的室友，他唯一喜欢做的事情就是吸大麻。

yingyinNormal.en: You have an M134 in your armory. Put it on a chopper and smoke this thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的军械库里有M134机枪，把它装到直升机上，然后干掉这个家伙！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 冒烟的；冒蒸汽的；充满活力的；令人兴奋的

word_family.mean: n. 烟；大城市；抽烟；雪茄；香烟

examination_example.sentence: "Dare to be different, please don't <highlight>smoke</highlight>!" pleads one billboard campaign aimed at reducing smoking among teenagers — teenagers, who desire nothing more than fitting in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “敢与众不同，请不要抽烟!”一项旨在减少青少年吸烟的广告牌宣传活动如此呼吁，而青少年最渴望的就是融入社会。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无烟的；禁止吸烟的
adj. 有烟的；有烟味的；烟雾弥漫的；产生大量烟的；有熏制食物味道的；像烟（雾）的
n. 吸烟者；熏制者；抽烟聚会；烟熏器；吸烟室

word_family.mean: n. 烟；大城市；抽烟；雪茄；香烟

examination_example.sentence: Works of art that sustained <highlight>smoke</highlight> damage were being taken to the Louvre.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遭受烟雾破坏的艺术品被带到卢浮宫。

examination_example.sentence: This is much like a non-smoker getting cancer from second-hand <highlight>smoke</highlight>, while the heavy smoker is fortunate enough to <highlight>smoke</highlight> in good health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这很像一个不吸烟的人因为二手烟而得癌症，而烟瘾大的人却很幸运地拥有健康的身体。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 冒烟的；冒蒸汽的；充满活力的；令人兴奋的
n. 吸烟者；熏制者；抽烟聚会；烟熏器；吸烟室

word_family.mean: n. 烟；大城市；抽烟；雪茄；香烟

examination_example.sentence: There are a lot of studies on the relationship between breakfast eating and possible health outcomes, but this may be because those who eat breakfast choose to habitually have health-enhancing behaviours such as regular exercise and not <highlight>smoking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于吃早餐与可能的健康结果之间的关联，有很多研究，但这可能是因为那些吃早餐的人通常会选择有益健康的习惯和行为，比如不抽烟、经常做运动。

examination_example.sentence: In the same way physicians used to smoke, and then stopped <highlight>smoking</highlight> and were able to talk to patients about it,  I think <highlight>physicians</highlight> can have a bigger voice in it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像医生过去吸烟，然后戒烟，能够与病人谈论吸烟一样，我认为医生可以有更大的发言权。

examination_example.sentence: Big tobacco companies were frank with their customers about the hazards of <highlight>smoking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大型烟草公司对顾客坦诚吸烟的危害。

examination_example.sentence: Most recognizable of the ship designs are the ship's <highlight>smoke</highlight> stacks, but the fourth stack was actually just artistic in nature and served no functional purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邮船设计中最容易识别的是船舶的烟囱，但第4个烟囱实际上仅仅是艺术装饰，并没有其他功能。

direction_info.description:

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 吸烟者；熏制者；抽烟聚会；烟熏器；吸烟室

word_family.mean: n. 烟；大城市；抽烟；雪茄；香烟

examination_example.sentence: They rose in the ranks not by being friendly but by <highlight>smoking</highlight> cigarettes, breaking rules and playing jokes on others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在（学生）地位中上升，方式不是通过待人友善而是通过吸烟、违反规则和嘲弄别人。

examination_example.sentence: They rose in the ranks not by being friendly but by <highlight>smoking</highlight> cigarettes, breaking rules and playing jokes on others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在（学生）地位中上升，方式不是通过待人友善而是通过吸烟、违反规则和嘲弄别人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 冒烟的；冒蒸汽的；充满活力的；令人兴奋的
n. 吸烟者；熏制者；抽烟聚会；烟熏器；吸烟室

word_family.mean: n. 烟；大城市；抽烟；雪茄；香烟

examination_example.sentence: Open the window and have some fresh air in, too much <highlight>smoke</highlight> in the room.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打开窗户，透透气，房间里烟太多了。

examination_example.sentence: If it feels hot, there may be <highlight>smoke</highlight> or fire behind the door, so take care.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果感觉很热，门后可能有烟或火，要小心。

examination_example.sentence: Some people start <highlight>smoking</highlight> at a young age because their parents smoke.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人很小就开始吸烟，因为他们的父母吸烟。

examination_example.sentence: I had to stop <highlight>smoking</highlight> because of a serious illness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为重病，我不得不戒烟。

examination_example.sentence: In China，people cannot <highlight>smoke</highlight> before other people finish eating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国，在别人吃完饭之前，人们不能抽烟。
